data.title: Reliable. Comfortable. Convenient.
data.meta_description: Visit nwnatural.com to discover the affordability, reliability, comforts and conveniences of natural gas at home. Once you're a customer, you can register accounts, check your gas use, make payments and manage service online.
data.text:
Start Service →

Begin service at a new residence location.

Stop Service →

Stop service and close your account.

Transfer Service →

Moving? Transfer service to a new location.

We’re working to introduce clean hydrogen

Hydrogen is a versatile energy source that can do many things natural gas does but with less of a climate impact.

Learn more

Free NW Natural safety app comes with essential safety tools

Add your own emergency numbers, tap to call 811 before you dig, and enter for a chance to win an emergency kit.

See details

Resources for past-due account balances

If you need help paying or catching up on monthly energy bills, we may have options that can help.

See options

Washington Cap and Invest Program

Have questions about how the WA Cap and Invest Program will affect your bill?

Learn more
